project.description:
Keywords: + Functional Programming, Java 8 + Multiple inheritance
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates how to the multiple inheritance rules works in Java 8.
MultipleInheritanceRunner: Illustrates three scenarios in which the inheritance rules for classes implementing interfaces with default methods apply.
DiamondProblemRunner: An example of the C++ multiple inheritance diamond problem for Java.
